content.question: Let <math alttext="y equals f open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> be an invertible function, where <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> is any real number. The parametric functions <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> and <math alttext="h"><mi>h</mi></math> are inverses of each other and are defined for all <math alttext="t"><mi>t</mi></math>. Which of the following could be <math alttext="g open parentheses t close parentheses"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="h open parentheses t close parentheses"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="g open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses equals open parentheses t comma f inverse open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>,</mo><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="h open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses equals open parentheses f open parentheses t close parentheses comma f inverse to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="g open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses equals open parentheses f inverse open parentheses t close parentheses comma t close parentheses"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="h open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses equals open parentheses f open parentheses t close parentheses comma f inverse to the power of negative 1 end exponent open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><msup><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="g open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses equals open parentheses t comma t close parentheses"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="h open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses equals open parentheses f open parentheses t close parentheses comma f open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math alttext="g open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses equals open parentheses t comma f open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="h open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses equals open parentheses f open parentheses t close parentheses comma t close parentheses"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="g open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses equals open parentheses t comma f open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>,</mo><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="h open parentheses t close parentheses equals open parentheses x open parentheses t close parentheses comma y open parentheses t close parentheses close parentheses equals open parentheses f open parentheses t close parentheses comma t close parentheses"><mi>h</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>y</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfenced><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>,</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

unit.text: 4: Functions Involving Parameters, Vectors, and Matrices (Not assessed on the AP Exam)

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
